Author: elektorhyperion
Text: also im pretty sure one of the real reasons he doest wanna stay with me like that is because he told me he wanted to know the *real* me, and for me to not lie, and told me i could trust him and that he was willing to listen and be patient!   so i told him im bipolar and at one point had a very small cry session in his arms and he THANKED ME for being open but then he started being distant and then this. soooo it makes a girl wonder lol  i may just be paranoid idk... i dont blame him and i still think hes a good guy and i wish him the best. but see ya, bro!!
